Trial_Design.evidence: patients were prospectively enrolled in a randomized trial

Intervention.evidence: randomized trial of adjuvant therapy with a whole-cell melanoma vaccine plus Bacille Calmette-Guerin (BCG) vs. placebo plus BCG

Objective.evidence: Objective: To verify circulating tumor cell (CTC) prognostic utility in stage IV resected melanoma patients

Method_Outcome.evidence: pretreatment CTC (>0 vs. 0 biomarker) status was significantly associated with disease-free survival (DFS) (HR 1.64, p=0.002) and overall survival (OS) (HR 1.53, p=0.028)

Number_Randomised.evidence: Blood specimens obtained pretreatment (n=244) and during treatment (n=214)

Result_Outcome.evidence: pretreatment CTC (>0 vs. 0 biomarker) status was significantly associated with disease-free survival (DFS) (HR 1.64, p=0.002) and overall survival (OS) (HR 1.53, p=0.028)
